sentences.en: a family taken hostage at gunpoint
sentences.cn: 在枪口下被劫为人质的一家人

sentences.en: Everybody who goes into this region, whoever they are, is at risk of being taken hostage.
sentences.cn: 进入这个地区的人，不管是谁，都有被劫为人质的危险。

sentences.en: Have you read the article about the rescue of the hostage?
sentences.cn: 你看了关于营救人质的文章了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He must be treated as a hostage of high rank, not as a common prisoner.
sentences.cn: 必须把他当成高级人质来对待，而不能像对待普通囚犯那样。

sentences.en: making objectives explicit is to &B{give a hostage to fortune}.
sentences.cn: 使目的明确就要承担风险。

sentences.en: Maybe Sollozzo figures to snatch you and hold you for a hostage to make a deal. "
sentences.cn: 说不定索洛佐想抓住你作人质,逼我们同意做些交易. ”

sentences.en: The demand of the public holds the artist hostage to his or her own success, fame.
sentences.cn: 为丁维持自己的成功和声誉,群众的要求竟把这位艺术家如人质般束缚住了.

sentences.en: The embattled president also denied recent claims that he was being held hostage by his own soldiers.
sentences.cn: 焦头烂额的总统还否认了最近有关他被自己的士兵挟持为人质的说法。

sentences.en: The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The group are holding two tourists hostage (= keeping them as hostages ) .
sentences.cn: 这伙人挟持了两名游客作为人质。

sentences.en: The highjackers held two women hostage.
sentences.cn: 劫机者扣留两名妇女作人质.

sentences.en: The hostage had a rifle levelled at his head.
sentences.cn: 一枝步枪瞄准着人质的头.

sentences.en: The hostage had been shackled to a radiator.
sentences.cn: 当时人质被铐在暖气片上。

sentences.en: The hostage release could clear the decks for war.
sentences.cn: 人质的获释可能会为发动战争扫清障碍。

sentences.en: The reporting of the hostage story was fair, if sometimes overblown.
sentences.cn: 尽管这篇关于人质的报道有些夸大其词，但还算公正。

sentences.en: There are conflicting reports about the identity of the hostage.
sentences.cn: 有关人质身份的报道相互矛盾。

sentences.en: Three children were taken hostage during the bank robbery.
sentences.cn: 在银行抢劫案中有三名儿童被扣为人质。

sentences.en: Wine growers say they've been held hostage to the interests of the cereal and soybean farmers.
sentences.cn: 葡萄种植兼酿酒者说他们一直都为谷物和大豆种植者的利益所绑架。

words.tran_cn: [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多

phrases.tran_cn: 招惹麻烦（或不明智、很难做到）的行为（或许诺、话语）担风险

trans.tran_en: someone who is kept as a prisoner by an enemy so that the other side will do what the enemy demands
